data.name: О! 这个美丽的新 "红色 "世界!
data.detailed_description:
By 2100 a. d. there is no independent countries on the Earth. The one country is the Union of Soviet Republics (USR) being ruled by eternal and immortal Great Leader J. Stalin.
For the hundred years of peace soviet scientist made a great technological progress. Humankind not only colonized the Solar System, but also found a way to other galaxies.
You will lead Lieutenant Alex D. Williams, fighter pilot of the Workers` and Peasants` Red Space Fleet.

Use advanced weapons developed by soviet scientists:

- Powerful shield protects from all damage for a short time;
- Turbo-laser deals a terrible damage for a short time;
- Mega-bomb immediately destroys all enemies in a short radius



Take payments for destroying enemies. You may use it to upgrade your ship:
- Increase durability;
- Upgrade basic weapon;
- Equip your ship with more destructive missiles;
- Install more powerful shield generator;
- Upgrade turbo-lasers for a longer firing time;
- Upgrade mega-bomb for a wider damage radius.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: This is the game in the genre of Vertical Shoot’Em Up. Using only your mouse, you will lead one of the “Stalin` falcons” and take part in the Liberation Campaign of the Red Army in the far distant future.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel (R) Core(TM)i5-4460 CPU @ 3.20Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon (TM)R9 380 Series

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
